description:
You can customize Group Policy, Services and Tasks responsible for data collection and transmission as you like. And furthermore, if you want, you can block a bunch of Microsoft's IP's to which data is sent.
WPD is free, totally portable, has a nice user-friendly interface and doesn't contain any advertisement or malicious code. 

## Supported OS
* Windows 11 Home, Pro, Education, Enterprise
* Windows 10 Home (1703-2009), Pro (1607-2009), Education (1703-2009), Enterprise (1607-2009), Enterprise LTSC (2015-2019)
* Windows Server Standard 2016, 2019
* Windows 8-8.1
* Windows 7
summary: a tweaker that contains all main settings in one place!
author: WPD Team
